Note: Initials "NBT" in a circle appear on the right side of poster. "United Cigar Stores Co., window display" is stamped on the back. Orientation:  Vertical.
Description: The poster advertises National War Savings Pledge Day, June 28th,1918. Buy W.S.S. stamps, sold at cigar stores. The illustration shows a man signing up for W.S.S. stamps at a table with Uncle Sam.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: National war savings pledge day
